body_html:
There is now a couple of official ops that let you query amount of memory used, this obviates the need for opening up the API.

I think a bigger issue is that allocator API only gives correct results for GPU memory and not CPU memory. There used to be a work-around by parsing allocation/deallocation messages, but deallocation information stopped being correctly printed in version 1.1 #6716

body:
There is now a couple of official ops that let you query amount of memory used, this obviates the need for opening up the API.

I think a bigger issue is that allocator API only gives correct results for GPU memory and not CPU memory. There used to be a work-around by parsing allocation/deallocation messages, but deallocation information stopped being correctly printed in version 1.1 https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/6716
